title: Moderate-speed city driving at night with clear skies.
caption: The ego vehicle drives straight on a city street at night, with moderate traffic and clear skies.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.2 m/s). There are 6 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The ego vehicle is driving straight on a city street at night, with moderate traffic and clear skies. There are several other cars on the road, some of them are driving at a moderate speed while others are parked on the side of the road. The road is well-lit with streetlights and there are several traffic lights along the way. The weather is clear and there are no visible obstacles on the road.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving straight on the city street at night because it is following the traffic rules and there are no visible obstacles on the road. The driver is maintaining a moderate speed to ensure safe driving and is keeping a safe distance from other vehicles on the road. The driver is also paying attention to the traffic lights and is following their signals. The braking events or strong decelerations in the driving metadata indicate that the driver is reacting to sudden changes in the traffic situation or to potential risks on the road.
